item.title: Otis Redding - Sittin' on the Dock of the Bay - Cynthia Lin Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Sittin' on the Dock of the Bay performed by Otis Redding.

item.title: Queen Naija - Butterflies - Key of G - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song Butterflies performed by Queen Naija. Chords used in the song: Dmaj7, Em7, F♯m, Gmaj7.

item.title: Bill Withers - Lovely Day - Key of F - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song Lovely Day performed by Bill Withers. Chords used in the song: B♭m7, B♭maj7, Cm7, C♯maj7, Dm7, E♭, F.

item.title: Fats Domino - Blueberry Hill - Key of C - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Blueberry Hill performed by Fats Domino. Chords used in the song: B7, Bdim7, C, C7, E7, F, Fm, G7.

item.title: Bill Withers - Ain't No Sunshine - Ukeledu Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Ain't No Sunshine performed by Bill Withers. Chords used in the song: C6, Dm, Em7, G.

item.title: Johnny Cash - Folsom Prison Blues - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Folsom Prison Blues performed by Johnny Cash. Chords used in the song: C, D7, G, G7.

item.title: Johnny Cash - Folsom Prison Blues - Key of F - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Folsom Prison Blues performed by Johnny Cash. Chords used in the song: B♭, C7, F, F7.

item.title: Ben E King - Stand By Me - Key of G - Dr. A
item.description: Play along video for the song Stand By Me performed by Ben E King. Chords used in the song: C, D, Em, G.

item.title: B.o.B - Nothin' On You - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Nothin' On You performed by B.o.B. Chords used in the song: Cm7, Dm, D♯maj7, F.
